lead_paragraph: As the American team prepares for its World Cup opener against Australia on June 8, Coach Jill Ellis has been mixing and matching players on the back line and getting consistently strong results.

headline.main: U.S. Women’s Defense Counters Inexperience With Energy and Communication
headline.print_headline: U.S. Women’s Defense Counters Inexperience With Energy and Communication

snippet: As the American team prepares for its World Cup opener against Australia on June 8, Coach Jill Ellis has been mixing and matching players on the back line and getting consistently strong results.
